pages.text: $(li)The Item Shelf is a decoration block that works like the $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frames$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can place items just right clicking on there while you have an item in your hand.
$(li)The Item Shelf can be placed on $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chests$(/l) to label them.$(br)This one will not bother you when you open the chest.
